## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G04530](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G04530)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPPCK2, PEPCK2, PPCK2</u>
- **Gene Name:** PHOSPHOENOLPYRUVATE CARBOXYLASE KINASE 2, phosphoenolpyruvate carboxylase kinase 2
- **Description:**   phosphoenolpyruvate carboxylase kinase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2100875
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
